verses.roman:
āge avatārilā ye ye guru-parivāra
saṅkṣepe kahiye, kahā nā yāya vistāra

synonyms: āge—first of all; avatārilā—allowed to descend; ye ye—all those; guru-parivāra—family of spiritual masters; saṅkṣepe—in brief; kahiye—I describe; kahā—to describe; nā—not; yāya—possible; vistāra—expansively.
translation: Lord Kṛṣṇa therefore first allowed His family of superiors to descend on the earth. I shall try to describe them in brief because it is not possible to describe them fully.
